title: Adopt Commander for CLI parsing
description: Replace the manual process.argv parsing (switch statement in src/index.ts) with Commander. Benefits: structured arg/option definitions, auto-generated help with argument types and choices, built-in version display, .addHelpText() for detailed per-command docs. Each command in src/commands/ should export a register function that takes a Commander program instance. Business logic stays untouched — only the parsing/routing layer changes.

title: Adopt chalk for output formatting
description: Replace raw ANSI escape codes in src/output.ts with chalk. Currently using manual TTY/NO_COLOR detection and c.green/c.red/c.bold/c.dim helper functions. Chalk handles terminal capability detection automatically. Migrate: c.green → chalk.green, c.red → chalk.red, etc. Preserve the outputJson/printSuccess/printError/printIssueOneLine/printIssueFull helpers but use chalk underneath. Success indicator should be ✔ (green), errors should use 'Error:' prefix (red).

title: Use process.exitCode instead of process.exit()
description: The main catch block in src/index.ts uses process.exit(1) which kills the event loop immediately. Switch to process.exitCode = 1 for better testability — allows the event loop to drain so bun test can capture output cleanly. The JSON error shape { success: false, command, error } is already good. Ensure all commands surface errors consistently: console.error() with chalk.red in human mode, structured JSON in --json mode.
